channel.title: mike oldfield on Castálio Podcast

item.title: Pete Savage: Git In The Trenches (GITT)
item.description: First off I'd like to welcome all the new visitors to this podcast's 17th episode and the very first one done in English! This podcast was born out of my curiosity of getting to know a bit more about the people I have met, whether in person or online, and go beyond the superficial information about them. So instead of just talking about what I already knew, I wanted to focus on what I didn't know.
